question: Electromotive force (emf) of a cell is defined as:
correct_answer: Energy per unit charge supplied by the source

correct_answer: No voltage drop across internal resistance

correct_answer: In series current is same; in parallel voltage is same
incorrect_answers: In series voltage is same; in parallel current is same
Both have same current and voltage
Parallel circuits never have same voltage
Series circuits never have same current
